lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: Firstly, it is important to work to improve the lives of others in whatever way we can.  Second, loaning gives individuals the opportunity to earn a continuous stream of income, so they can continually support themselves through time versus accepting a "handout."  I believe this fosters independence versus dependence, which is important.  Donations go further this way, and you are helping more people.

lenders.occupational_info: I work on an airplane called the Global Hawk.  It is a very complex airplane that flies without a pilot.  It flies very high (60,000 ft) and takes pictures with special cameras that can see at night and can detect heat.  The US government uses it in Iraq.  There are no weapons onboard.  In the 2007 wildfires in southern California it was used to take pictures of the fires (the cameras can see through smoke).  These pictures were used to help the firefighters track the progress of the fires and help people who needed to be evacuated.

lenders.name: AMIRALI
lenders.loan_because:
Since I have been in the same situation previously, I fully understand desires and hopes of these individuals entrepreneurs to fulfill their aspirations, ambitions and achieve their vision to grow in this world like anybody else and be proud of it.
My mentor always preached that You must remember that life will have for you many disappointments. If one-fifth of one’s hopes are realized, one is extremely lucky and fortunate, so do not be discouraged  by disappointments. Failures should be forgotten and new efforts made. Despondency is a sin, and hope, a necessary part of faith both for material wealth and, above all, for progress to spiritual enlightenment.”
Furthermore he made it clear “Struggle is the meaning of life. Defeat or victory is in the hands of God, but struggle itself is man’s duty and should be his joy.”
lenders.occupational_info: My work starts early in the morning and ends late in the evenings six days a week. Recently on  Sundays i have been taking it  easy  so that i can run my personal errands.

lenders.loan_because: I wanted to loan because their are so many needy people her in the Philippines that cannot afford to pay their medical bills and medication to alleviate their health. the money that I will borrowed her will be also be offered to them for their immediate assistance during emergency, and make them pay later the amount used in a specified length of time to lessen the difficulty of paying it. Part of the money loaned here will also be used in the Orphanage center memorizing the Qur'an. And half of the money will be invested in agriculture and Internet cafe to insure the repayment of amount loaned in the specified length of time.

lenders.name: Dorapalli
lenders.loan_because: I need a loan because I want to start a detergent powder making unit for the poor tribal women around me who are suffering without food and basic needs. To set up this unit I need $650.
lenders.occupational_info: As a woman I can understand the problems of women. I live in a small village called Kothapatnam in Andhra Pradesh state in India. My husband is a pastor and a social worker. There are lot of tribal women around our house. Their main occupation is fishing. Men go on fishing. Women stay back at home without any work. They don't have any other source of income except the money comes from the fish that was caught by their husbands. I have seen people sleeping without food as they don't get much income everyday. By seeing all the problems of these women I was moved in my heart and have thought of starting an income generating project i.e detergent powder making unit to help these poor malnourished women with some additional income to feed themselves.

lenders.name: carolina
lenders.loan_because: one hand wash the other hand

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have access to the tools and funds needed to succeed in living their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: We buy and sell music instruments, sheet music and accessories.  We work closely  with local musicians and teachers to coordinate lessons and instructional clinics as well as performances to share our love of music with the community.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to make a difference in the world, one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am studying for the bar exam so that I can get licensed as an attorney and (hopefully) practice non-profit law.

Microfinance has the capability to change individual lives, families, and entire economies.

lenders.loan_because: We are six grandchildren who have chosen to honor our Grandma Eleanor by making a loan in her name to one of Kiva's entrepreneurs. We plan to keep the loan rotating -- a gift that keeps giving, just like our grandmother.

lenders.name: Whitney
lenders.loan_because: Working for Children International I see first hand what a difference one sponsor can make for the child and their family. I recently discovered Kiva and I was impressed with the certain sponsorship program they offer. Its all a great way to make a difference around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with Children International involves a one on one relationship with our sponsors to help better the lives of the children they sponsor. From letters, emails, memos, packages, financial aspects, finding children for sponsorship and even travel...working here is a wonderful experience with a huge responsibility.
